name: Shovel Knight Maker
description:
Create your own Shovel Knight levels; use elements from the iconic game to form brand new stages! Note: Currently I am working purely on refining the level editor side of the game, not the level playing side, though anticipate that in the future.

Controls:

Use Tool - Left Click/Space

Move Camera - WASD/Arrow Keys

Zoom Camera - Mouse Scroll

Pan Camera - Right Click (Drag)

Toggle Erase -  Shift (Hold)

Undo - Z

Open Element Menu - Click and drag on the Hotbar to open the element select menu, then drag elements into the Hotbar to swap them out. (Pressing "i" on downloadable version only also works)
